1990 sex abuse suit at Beverly school kept secret

the angle

Can Boston ever be a 24-hour city?

Boston is famous, or infamous, for closing down early. Maybe it's our Puritan heritage. Whatever the reason, it's an inconvenience to a small but potentially significant slice of the workforce.
